name: Richard Burns Rally
description:
Richard Burns Rally is a simulation, sports and racing game developed by Warthog and Square Enix Europe. It was originally released in 2004. It was published by SCi Entertainment Group. Richard Burns Rally has a Metascore of 74, based on professional reviews. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Richard Burns Rally is available on Xbox, PC and PlayStation 2.
It was produced by Jane Cavanagh. Dean Evans, Paul Hodgson and Paul Oakenfold scored the game.
